title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This magnificent sword is a striking blend of dark elegance and formidable power, featuring a sleek, elongated blade that glows with a vivid red lightning motif. Its intricate hilt showcases menacing details, including jagged edges and a sinister design that suggests a connection to dark magic or ancient battles. The enchanting luminescence emanating from the blade not only enhances its visual appeal but also signifies its lethal capabilities in combat. Ideal for warriors who revel in danger and seek to harness the raw energy of the elements, this weapon is both a symbol of dominance and an unstoppable force on the battlefield.
